"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d444e16368721e605e1700#post_54d444e16368721e605e1700
Sriracha normally has a pretty sharp flavor with a bit of a tomatoey taste and a decently spicy kick

The addition of olive oil mellows it out a bit and it makes it taste kind of fruity and sweet actually. Still has that kick though.
